text: Vony povynni buty prynyzheni koly zavhodno vy zustrichayete yikh, yakshcho ne vony uphold BOZHA domovlenist使, tak zhe, yak i yikhni domovlenosti myru z vamy. Vony zaznaly hnivu z BOHA, ta, otzhe, vony zdiysnyuyut使sya shchob z路han使byty. Tse tomu, shcho vony vidkhylyly BOZHI vidkryttya, ta ubyly prorokiv nespravedlyvo. Tse tomu, shcho vony ne pidkoryalysya ta porushenym
